journey.title: Drone Systems Engineer
journey.description: Led cross-team projects from requirements to deployment. Led technical support operations for the drone division, analyzing drone crashes and working with cross-functional teams to identify root causes and troubleshoot systems for manufacturing teams and customers. Streamlined production processes and automated support workflows.

projects.name: Technical Support Operations
projects.description: Built log reviewers and issue trackers

projects.name: Support Workflow Automation
projects.description: Automated support workflows for faster response

journey.title: Software Engineer
journey.description: Developed custom PX4 flight modes and integrated sensors using MAVLink/UAVCAN. Led software development and optimized GPS/obstacle avoidance systems.

projects.name: Custom Flight Modes
projects.description: Developed Toss to Launch and other PX4 modes

projects.name: Sensor Integration
projects.description: Integrated sensors using MAVLink and UAVCAN

projects.name: GPS & Obstacle Avoidance
projects.description: Optimized GPS and obstacle avoidance systems

journey.title: Robotics R&D Engineer
journey.description: Developed prototype software for autonomous surveillance robots. Implemented vision & navigation algorithms. Built HMI for collaborative robotic arm programming.

projects.name: Autonomous Surveillance Robots
projects.description: Developed prototype software for mobile robots

projects.name: Collaborative Robotics Interface
projects.description: Developed HMI for Universal Robot programming

journey.title: Master of Science in Computer Science
journey.description: Thesis: 'Development of Baton: A Novel Precision Delivery Drone' - combining data mining with precision engineering for autonomous systems.
journey.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
journey.advisor: Dr. Matthew E. Taylor, Assistant Professor

journey.title: Bachelor of Technology in Information Technology
journey.description: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, developing passion for solving complex engineering problems and understanding system fundamentals.
journey.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Information Technology
